message: You are a disembodied consciousness, floating over the neon-drenched expanse of Chroma City.
A pull. A tug. A sense of falling...
You wake up with a gasp. The smell of stale synth-coffee fills your small apartment.
A notification buzzes on your phone: "Your first ride-share pickup is in 10 minutes."
You head out into the city.
Welcome to Urban Life Simulator. Seize the day.
